SEARCH
Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class JdbcMenuRepository

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.JdbcMenuRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuRepository
public class JdbcMenuRepository extends Object implements MenuRepository
Provides a JDBC implementation of the MenuRepository interface for performing CRUD operations on menu items and their associated ingredients.

This repository connects directly to a PostgreSQL database defined in dbSetup using JDBC. It manages records across the MenuItem, Ingredient, and MenuItemIngredient tables.

Responsibilities include:

  • Retrieving menu items with their linked ingredients
  • Inserting or updating menu item data
  • Adding or removing ingredient associations
  • Creating new ingredients if they do not exist

Each method uses try-with-resources to automatically manage database connections and statements, and wraps any SQLException in a RuntimeException.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • findAllWithIngredients

      public List<MenuItemModel> findAllWithIngredients()
      Retrieves all menu items and their associated ingredients.

      Performs a LEFT JOIN between the MenuItem, MenuItemIngredient, and Ingredient tables to gather all item and ingredient data.

      Specified by:
      findAllWithIngredients in interface MenuRepository
      Returns:
      a list of MenuItemModel objects, each with zero or more linked ingredients

    • upsertMenuItem

      public Integer upsertMenuItem(MenuItemModel item)
      Inserts or updates a MenuItemModel.

      If the item’s ID is null, a new record is inserted and the generated menu_item_id is returned. Otherwise, the existing record is updated.

      Specified by:
      upsertMenuItem in interface MenuRepository
      Parameters:
      item - the MenuItemModel to insert or update
      Returns:
      the menu_item_id of the inserted or updated record

    • deleteMenuItem

      public void deleteMenuItem(int menuItemId)
      Deletes a menu item from the database.
      Specified by:
      deleteMenuItem in interface MenuRepository
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of the MenuItem to delete

    • findOrCreateIngredientByName

      public IngredientModel findOrCreateIngredientByName(String nameFull)
      Finds an ingredient by its name or creates it if it does not exist.

      Performs a case-insensitive lookup by name, then inserts a new ingredient if no match is found.

      Specified by:
      findOrCreateIngredientByName in interface MenuRepository
      Parameters:
      nameFull - the ingredient name to search for or create
      Returns:
      the existing or newly inserted IngredientModel

    • addOrUpdateIngredientLink

      public MenuItemIngredientLink addOrUpdateIngredientLink(int menuItemId, int ingredientId, BigDecimal amountRequired)
      Adds or updates the link between a menu item and an ingredient.

      If a link already exists, its required amount is updated. Otherwise, a new MenuItemIngredient record is inserted.

      Specified by:
      addOrUpdateIngredientLink in interface MenuRepository
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the ID of the menu item
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient
      amountRequired - the amount of the ingredient required
      Returns:
      a MenuItemIngredientLink representing the inserted or updated link
